summary: A test suite dedicated to validating the SAM vision encoder implementation. It adapts generic modeling tests to SAM's unique input handling, checking configuration integrity, forwardâ€‘pass outputs such as image features, attention maps and hidden states, gradient propagation, model serialization, and training behaviours including gradient checkpointing.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the SAM model across different usage scenarios, prevent regressions, and confirm that training and inference pipelines function as expected.
